titleStmt.title: Two treatises, one of the latter day of iudgement: the other of the ioyes of Heauen
titleStmt.author: I. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Thomas Creed, and are to be solde at his house in the Olde Change, at the signe of the Eagle and Childe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: his house in the Olde Change, at the signe of the Eagle
